questions.question: What programs does the Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering offer?
questions.answer: The department offers an undergraduate program with an intake of 180 students and a postgraduate program in VLSI Design & Embedded Systems with an intake of 18 students. For more info, refer to https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-electronics-communication.php.
